mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order`(uid, order_num, status, count, amount, create_time, modify_time, point) VALUES (#{uid}, #{order_num}, #{status}, #{count}, #{amount}, #{create_time}, #{modify_time}, #{point})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `order` WHERE uid = #{uid} AND status = #{status}
mapper.update: UPDATE `order` SET address_id = #{address_id}, coupon_id = #{coupon_id}, status = #{status}, memo = #{memo}, pay = #{pay}, modify_time = #{modify_time}, point = #{point} WHERE id = #{id}
